name: Spring it all!
description:
Our entry for the Godot Wild Jam 20.

Try to plant as many Dandelions as possible.

DISCLAIMER: By mistake the Development(Cheat)-Codes weren't removed for the submission. You may treat them as additional eastereggs, but we don't take responsibilities for crashed games ;)

Art: Stephanie & Ardian

Music, Sound: Benjamin & Alan

Programming: Dardan

Thanks to:

- Däster, Jenny, Mathias for playtesting

- Bradinator64 for saving our programmer from insanity

- the whole GWJ community for their support and lots of fun during the jam
